column2: Latest;Phnom Penh: A man believed  to be drunk lept into a rubbish filled sewage canal
column3: shocking the people and the authorities who then came to the rescue.------The incident took place around 10 pm on June 9
column5: on 1986 and 598 in Phnom Penhâ€™s Sen Sok district.------According to the source
column6: the man pulled up on a red-zoomer-x motorcycle
column8: and stopped at a store.------He then ran out of the store and jumped into the dirty water for no apparent reason.  Citizens and police searched the dirty depths for more than an hour before they found him under a bridge.------After being pulled out
